resources.string: Error creating GIF. Please try selecting a smaller dimension or fewer frames.
Your external storage is read only. Any GIFs created will not be saved to the filesystem.
External Storage Problem. Cannot read or write, any GIFs created will not be saved to the filesystem.
Please select at least one frame
Memory exhausted. Please try a smaller fps, dimensions, or video interval.
Unable to retrieve path, please try again.
Warning: Your phone cannot handle the selected settings and is highly likely it will crash. Please choose a smaller FPS, dimensions, or video interval. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
GIF will contain watermark, purchase the key in marketplace to remove!
